Package dao

Class BorrowRecordDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.BorrowRecordDAO
public class BorrowRecordDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for BorrowRecord entity. Manages database operations for borrowing records including tracking borrowed items, returns, and overdue calculations.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Library Management System

  • Constructor Details

    • BorrowRecordDAO

      public BorrowRecordDAO()

  • Method Details

    • initializeTable

      public void initializeTable()
      Initializes the borrow_records table in the database. Creates the table with foreign key relationships to users and media tables.

    • insert

      public int insert(int userId, int mediaId, String mediaType, String mediaTitle, LocalDate borrowDate, LocalDate dueDate)
      Inserts a new borrow record into the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user borrowing the media
      mediaId - the ID of the media being borrowed
      mediaType - the type of media (book or cd)
      mediaTitle - the title of the media
      borrowDate - the date the media was borrowed
      dueDate - the date the media is due to be returned
      Returns:
      the generated record ID if successful, -1 otherwise

    • markAsReturned

      public boolean markAsReturned(int recordId, LocalDate returnDate, double fine)
      Marks a borrow record as returned.
      Parameters:
      recordId - the ID of the borrow record
      returnDate - the date the media was returned
      fine - the fine amount (if any) for late return
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise

    • findActiveByUserId

      public List<MediaRecord> findActiveByUserId(int userId)
      Finds all active (not returned) borrow records for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      List of MediaRecord objects representing active borrows

    • getUsersWithOverdueBooks

      public List<UserWithOverdueBooks> getUsersWithOverdueBooks()
      Retrieves all users who have overdue books.
      Returns:
      List of UserWithOverdueBooks objects containing user information and overdue count

    • findOverdueByUserId

      public List<MediaRecord> findOverdueByUserId(int userId)
      Finds all overdue borrow records for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      List of overdue MediaRecord objects

    • countActiveByUserId

      public int countActiveByUserId(int userId)
      Counts the number of active (not returned) borrow records for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      the count of active borrow records
